summary: Add a new video section featuring the 'Glass Half Empty' video between the Experience section and Contact section. The implementation will use HTML5 video element with custom styling that matches the existing glass-morphism design theme, ensuring responsive behavior and appropriate sizing for the non-HD video quality.

action_plan.description: Add video section HTML structure between Experience and Contact sections in index.html. Include section container, title, video element with controls, and description text.
Add video navigation link to the navbar menu to maintain consistency with other sections.
Create CSS styling for the video section matching the glass-morphism theme. Include responsive video container, section styling consistent with other sections, and hover effects.
Add video section initialization to the JavaScript file to ensure proper fade-in animations and scroll behavior consistent with other sections.
Test video playback functionality, responsive behavior across different screen sizes, and ensure the video section integrates seamlessly with existing scroll animations and navigation.

risks: Video file size (16MB) may impact page load performance on slower connections
Video format (.mov) may have compatibility issues with some browsers
Non-HD video quality may appear pixelated on high-resolution displays
Video autoplay policies in browsers may prevent automatic playback
dependencies: Current glass-morphism CSS design system and variables
Existing JavaScript animation and scroll handling framework
Responsive grid system already implemented in the portfolio
issue_title: Feature Request: Add video section with playable 'Glass Half Empty' video
